Bash(C:/Windows/System32/WindowsPowerShell/v1.0/powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
$ytdlpPath = ''C:\\Users\\Owner\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\WinGet\\Packages\\yt-dlp.yt-dlp_Microsoft.Winget.Source_8wekyb3d8bbwe\\yt-dlp.exe''
$url = ''https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5NV6Rdv1a3I''
$outputDir = ''H:\\FreshWax-Backup''
$archiveFile = ""$outputDir\\downloaded.txt""

Write-Host ''Downloading DJ Shadow - Building Steam With A Grain Of Salt...''
& $ytdlpPath $url --download-archive $archiveFile -x --audio-format mp3 --audio-quality 0 -o ""$outputDir\\%\(title\)s [%\(id\)s].%\(ext\)s"" --no-overwrites --write-info-json --write-thumbnail --embed-thumbnail --add-metadata --no-playlist --retries 3
Write-Host ''Done!''
")
